AND( ISPICKVAL(CIF_Type__c, "CONTACT REQUEST"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(CIF_Sub_Type__c, "Ownership")), (AND( ISBLANK(Mobile__c), ISBLANK(E_MAIL__c) ) ), $User.Id <> '0057T0000022JDC', $User.Id <> '0053X000008mV6h'
